العبد المملوك
موسى بن صدقة التّاجر اليهودي
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
صلوات اللّه وبركاته ونوامي زكواته وأفضل سلامه وتحيّاته على مولانا
وسيّدنا وإمام عصرنا وزماننا الإمام الآمر بأحكام اللّه أمير المومپپن وعلى
آبائه الطّاهرين وأبنائه الأكرمين صلاة باقية إلى يوم الدّين المملوك يقبّل الأرض
أمام المقام النّبوي الطّاهر الشّريف ضاعف اللّه أنواره وأسنى
مناره ونصر جيوشه وأعلامه وأنصاره وينهي
أنّه وصل من الهند واليمن بتجارة وقراض معه
فأعيق فعيق بشبهة لم تحق تجوز إعاقته به وقد أثبت المملوك
في مجلس القاضي جلال الملك تاج الأحكام إزالة للاعتراض
والمملوك يسئل يسل ويضرع بالإنعام عليه والإحسان
إليه بخروج التّوقيع العالي زاده اللّه عزّا نفاذا وشرفا
إلى القاضي جلال الملك تاج الأحكام باكـ بذكر ما ثبت أثبت المملوك
عنده ليكون ذلك سببا لإيصاله إلى حقّه رأفة
له وحنوّا عليه ولمولانا سلام اللّه على ذكره
الرّأي الأعلا في ذلك إن شا اللّه عز وجل
والحمد للّه وحده
وصلوات اللّه على سيّدنا محمّد النّبي وآله وسلامه

The servant and slave The slave,
Mūsā b. Ṣadaqa, the Jewish merchant.
In the name of God, the merciful and compassionate. In the name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate.
The benedictions of God and his blessings, his increasing benefactions and most excellent peace and blessings be upon our master The blessings and benedictions of God, and His increasing benefactions and most excellent blessings be upon our Lord
and lord, the ʾimām of our era and time, the ʾimām al-ʾĀmir bi-ʾAḥkām Allāh, commander of the faithful, and upon and Master the Imam al-Āmir bi-Aḥkām Allāh, Commander of the Faithful, and
his pure ancestors and most noble sons, enduring benedictions, which last until the day of judgment. The slave kisses the ground his pure ancestors and noble sons - blessings lasting till the day of judgment. The slave kisses the earth
before the pure and noble prophetical presence, may God double its light and exalt in front of the pure and noble prophetic presence, may God double its light and exalt
its beacon, and give victory to its armies, banners and helpers, and reports its torch, and give victory to its armies, banners and helpers, and reports as follows:
He has arrived from India and the Yemen bringing merchandise as well as [money, or goods, in] commenda that he arrived from India and Yemen with merchandise and (goods or money) in commenda
but it was detained by a pretext on which it was not lawful for it to be detained. The slave had registered (documents) but it was detained by a pretext which was not a proper reason for detention. The slave has established ...
in the court of the Kadi Calāl al-Mulk Tāc al-Aḥkām to ... in the court of the qāḍī Jalāl al-Mulk Tāj al-ʾAḥkām in order to prevent [any dispute]
The slave humbly asks for a kindness to be bestowed upon him and a benefaction granted The slave humbly petitions that the benefaction be bestowed upon, and the favor granted to,
him, to wit the issue of an exalted document (may God increase its glory and nobility) to him by the issuing of an exalted rescript, may God increase its efficacy and nobility,
ordering the Kadi Calāl al-Mulk Tāc al-Aḥkām to ... what the slave had established to the qāḍī Jalāl al-Mulk Tāj al-ʾAḥkām (instructing him) to indicate what the slave has registered
before him - out of mercy with him, in order that this be a means of restoring his right to him, out of compassion
and commiseration for him. To our lord, the peace of God be upon his name, for him. To our Lord (God's greeting be upon his name)
belongs the exalted opinion in this matter, if God wills. Praise be to God alone. belongs the exalted resolution in this, if God wills, he is mighty and glorious.
Praise be to God alone.
God's blessings and greetings be upon our Lord Muḥammad the prophet and his family. The blessings and peace of God be upon our lord Muḥammad the prophet and his family.
